kubejs.ponder.corrupt_mana_scene.text_1: Throw some mana blocks into the mix
Mana Condensers can also be placed over Mechanical Belts
If the inventory or belt is full, then the Mana Condensers will stop sending out blocks.
kubejs.ponder.mana_condenser_scene.text_: Providing rotational force to Mana Condensers produces Corrupt Inert Mana Blocks
Place Mana Condenser over any inventory with space to collect mana blocks
kubejs.ponder.mana_generator_scene.text_: The Mana Generator converts liquid Pure Mana into Botania Real Mana.
Pipe in liquid Pure Mana into the Mana Generator.
Place a Mana Pool on top of the Mana Generator.
Provide rotational force (SU) to the Mana Generator.
The mana pool will slowly fill. You now have real mana!
kubejs.ponder.mana_purify_block_scene.te: Surround a Pure Daisy with Corrupt Mana Blocks . . .
and the Corrupt Mana Blocks become Pure!
But don't wait too long to mine them!
kubejs.ponder.omnibox_scene.text_1: The omnibox has six synchronized input/output shafts.
kubejs.ponder.omnibox_scene.text_2: All opposing shafts rotate in the same direction.
kubejs.ponder.pure_mana_scene.text_1: Throw some mana blocks into the mix
kubejs.ponder.purify_liquid_mana_scene.t: Corrupted Mana Fluid is also purified via Pure Daisy
and the Corrupt Mana Blocks become Pure!
Filter the Smart Fluid Pipe for Pure Mana Fluid
When purified, the Pure Mana Fluid is pumped away
creatania.ponder.tag.mana_machines.descr: Can we pull mana from thin air?
creatania.ponder.tag.cobblegen.descripti: Sticks and stones might break your bones
creatania.ponder.tag.mana_blocks.descrip: All sorts of fancy pretty blocks!
